## Overview

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(terra)
library(ggplot2)

# Load JPG (Mars mosaic ~1 km)
mars <- rast("data/mars_viking_mdim21_clrmosaic_global_1024.jpg")
```

```{r}
ext(mars) <- c(-180, 180, -90, 90)
crs(mars) <- "EPSG:4326"  # acceptable placeholder CRS
```


```{r}
# Convert to dataframe for ggplot
mars_df <- as.data.frame(mars, xy = TRUE) 

names(mars_df) <- c("x","y","B","G","R")
```

```{r}
library(showtext)
font_add_google(name = 'Bad Script', 
                family = 'Bad Script')
showtext_auto()
showtext_opts(dpi = 300)
```

```{r}
ggplot(mars_df) +
  geom_raster(aes(x, y, fill = rgb(R/255, G/255, B/255))) +
  scale_fill_identity() +
  coord_equal() +
  theme_void() +
  labs(title = "Mars",
       subtitle = "Rasterized - Viking Color Mosaic - 1 km",
       caption = "#30DayMapChallenge 2025 | Day 18 | Out of the World\nData: astrogeology.usgs.gov database | Federica Gazzelloni") +
  ggthemes::theme_map() +
  theme(text = element_text(face="bold",color="#5d352a",family="Bad Script"),
        plot.title = element_text(size=18, hjust=0.5),
        plot.subtitle = element_text(size=12,hjust=0.5),
        plot.caption = element_text(size=8,hjust=0.5))

```

```{r}
ggsave("day18_out_of_this_world.png",width = 6,height =4,dpi=320,bg="#e2e2e2")
```
